[demo](https://hydra.ojack.xyz/?%3D)

![alt text](<./image/001.png>)

```code
a.setBins(4)
a.setSmooth(0.7)
noise(()=>a.fft[2]*10+2,0.1,0.2)
.modulate(noise(10,0.5,0.1))
.modulateScale(osc(15,0.01,0.53))
.color(()=>a.fft[2]/2.2+0.5,()=>a.fft[2]/1.8+0.5,()=>a.fft[1]/1.98+0.5)
.modulateScale(noise(15,1))
.diff(shape(4,()=>a.fft[3]+0.14,()=>a.fft[1]+0.3).repeatX(3).rotate(()=>Math.sin(time/4.5)))
.mult(shape(4,0.9))
.out(o0)
```
